alert.note: Alert for Clark; Hot Spring (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 21 at 4:13PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Clark and central Hot Spring Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 413 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Beirne, or 11 miles northeast of Prescott, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Arkadelphia... Malvern... Gurdon... Rockport... Caddo Valley... Perla... Whelen Springs... Beirne... Gum Springs in Clark County... Richwoods... DeGray Lake State Park... Donaldson... Friendship... Burtsell... Lower Lake Recreation Area... Curtis... Social Hill... Joan... De Roche... Midway in Hot Spring County... This includes Interstate 30 between mile markers 53 and 97. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
